import { Chip } from './Chip'
import { Playground, Props } from 'docz'

# Chip

This component renders a chip and passes along all props.

<Props of={Chip} />

## Example Usage

<Playground>
<Chip
 key="chip"
 uid="chip"
 text="Chip Label"
 onClose={()=>alert('Hey')}/>


</Playground>
